data.actual_result: They are in the same shades of black. (If you're using light theme like I normally do, the bar will be in white).
data.expected_result: Like on desktop, the button and the background of the message should be in different shades of black.
data.short_description: The bar/button/header that says the number of blocked messages is of the same shade of black as the message when expanded on Android whereas it's of a different shade of black when expanded on desktop.
data.steps_to_repro: - Block someone. - Find a message sent by them and expand it by clicking the "<number> Blocked messages" button. - Observe the shade of black used as background on the message and the one used as background on the button.
